description: Allows the user to transform their entire body or select parts of their body into any kind of weapon, including swords, pistols, rifles, cannons, and missiles.

abilities.description: Baby 5 transforms into a large sword that can be wielded or launched as a projectile.
Baby 5 transforms into a missile that can be launched at enemies, causing explosive damage.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to water and Sea Stone

reveals.information: Can transform into sword and missile forms

description: Allows the user to transform any part of their body or piece of worn clothing into propellers capable of rotation at high speed, becoming a Rotation Human.

abilities.description: Buffalo can spin body parts like propellers to fly and create powerful gusts of wind, and can use this to launch Baby 5's weapon forms as projectiles.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to water and Sea Stone

reveals.information: Can work in tandem with Baby 5 to launch her weapon forms as projectiles
